Best Paella of my life.  Wish I could find a place as good here in the states...anyone have recommendations?It's a classy place where many local families stop to have brunch.  I can see why...foods wonderful and the price tag isn't too bad.Service is a bit hurried and unfriendly, but that seemed to be the theme in Barcelona.  I'm just use to that super friendly California approach, but when in Barcelona...
